soba_userInput: Create subconcepts of "AI and LLMs and education" to completely describe the idea
soba_metaModelContext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ecore:EPackage xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore" name="mindMap" nsURI="http://mindmap/0.1" nsPrefix="map">
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Map">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="root" eType="//Concept" containment="true"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Concept">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="subConcepts" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept" containment="true" eOpposite="//Concept/parent"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="parent" eType="//Concept" eOpposite="//Concept/subConcepts"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="relatedTo" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept"/>
  </eClassifiers>
</ecore:EPackage>

subConcepts.name: Personalized Learning
subConcepts.description: Using AI and LLMs to tailor educational content and pace to individual student needs.

subConcepts.name: Automated Assessment
subConcepts.description: Employing AI to grade assignments, provide feedback, and assess student performance efficiently.

subConcepts.name: Intelligent Tutoring Systems
subConcepts.description: AI-driven systems that provide interactive tutoring and support to students.

subConcepts.name: Content Generation
subConcepts.description: Using LLMs to create educational materials, summaries, and explanations automatically.

subConcepts.name: Student Engagement
subConcepts.description: Enhancing student interaction and motivation through AI-powered tools and gamification.

subConcepts.name: Data-Driven Insights
subConcepts.description: Analyzing educational data with AI to improve teaching strategies and learning outcomes.

subConcepts.name: Ethical Considerations
subConcepts.description: Addressing privacy, bias, and fairness issues in the use of AI and LLMs in education.

subConcepts.name: Teacher Support
subConcepts.description: AI tools that assist educators in lesson planning, grading, and administrative tasks.

subConcepts.name: Accessibility
subConcepts.description: Leveraging AI to make education more accessible to students with disabilities or language barriers.

subConcepts.name: Future Trends
subConcepts.description: Exploring emerging AI technologies and their potential impact on education.
